mapper.select: SELECT * FROM sys_dict WHERE del_flag = 0 LIMIT #{beginIndex},#{pageSize}
SELECT * FROM sys_dict WHERE del_flag = 0 order by sort
SELECT count(id) FROM sys_dict WHERE del_flag = 0
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sys_dict( value, label, type, description, sort, create_date, update_date, remarks, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{value}, #{label}, #{type}, #{description}, #{sort}, #{createDate}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE sys_dict SET value = #{value}, label = #{label}, type = #{type}, description = #{description}, sort = #{sort}, update_date = #{updateDate} WHERE id = #{id}
